channel.title: Bad Company 2 Grenade Launcher Animation Bug
channel.description:
Okay so today I noticed a little annoying bug, its noting game breaking but its annoying. When I play as assault class and switch to my grenade launcher instead of flipping up the sights like it normally does, my guy puts away the gun completely and pulls it out again with the sights already flipped up. If anyone here is havin the problem and knows a fix any help would be greatly appreciated. I play the game max'd out @ 1680x1050 in DX10 with 4x AA and 16x AF.
If it helps here are my specs:
Case: Coolermaster HAF 932 CPU: Intel i7 920 @ 3.7ghz CPU Cooler: Coolermaster V10 Motherboard: Asus Rampage II Extreme GPU: Two XFX Xtreme Edition 1GB GDDR5 4890s In CrossfireX + 8800GT PhysX RAM: 6GB (2x3GB) Crucial Ballistix DDR3 1600 Power Supply: Ultra X4 1050W Modular PSU Keyboard: Saitek Eclipse Blue LED Version Mouse: Logitech MX518 Gaming Mouse Sound Card: Republic of Gamers Creative Supreme FX X-Fi Screen: 22in 1680x1050 Dell SP2008WFP Hard Drive: One Western Digital 500GB 7200rpm SATA II Speakers: Cyber Acoustics Gaming Series 2.1 Speaker Set Headset: Creative FATAL1TY Professional Edition Circumural Gaming Headset MK. II OS: Windows 7 Ultimate 64bit Retail
